item.title: 1500W Battery Charger to Power Supply Modification
item.description: Modified a Delta-Q “QuiQ 1500” battery charger to become a lab power supply. Identified locations in the control loop to override the feedback to allow for a controlled voltage and current output. Designed a circuit and implemented it using proto-board to avoid control loop saturation and initial overshoot.
